solution_line_template: She eats {beignets_per_morning} beignets every morning and there are {days_in_week} days in a week so she eats {beignets_per_morning}*{days_in_week} = <<{beignets_per_morning}*{days_in_week}={beignets_per_week}>>{beignets_per_week} beignets in a week

She eats {beignets_per_week} beignets in a week so over {num_weeks} weeks she will have eaten {beignets_per_week}*{num_weeks} = <<{beignets_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_beignets}>>{total_beignets} beignets
